ygData.msgSnippet: * BrightBlade bowed deeply to Hell Beast but kept her optics trained on the floor, she had not yet earned the right to look him in the face.*  Yes, My Lord. I

* BrightBlade bowed deeply to Hell Beast but kept her optics trained on the 
floor, she had not yet earned the right to look him in the face.*

" Yes, My Lord. I will not fail you."

* With that said she quickly turned and went off after Gangon, keeping her 
optics from Hell Beast as she left the room. BrightBlade came up beside 
Gangon and transformed into her fox beast mode, with a sigh she continued 
out of the base and towards the perimeter of their territory.
She looked up finally and around at the trees and land, the sun was 
beginning to set off to the far west. This just might turn out to be a long 
night.*
